name: DeathStar
0:
”Alexa, ask Death Star to initiate setup”
”Alexa, ask Death Star to set glow to 6”
”Alexa, ask Death Star to give full effects”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: death star
des:
Cater to your Imperialist loyalty and bring an artifact of the Empire to your home!

This skill allows you to register your device, switch it on or off, and open the panels to a desired position for controlling brightness. In addition, the product can give a minute-long demo of its full operational capability.

Register Device
- Alexa, ask Death Star to initiate setup

Switch On/Off
- Alexa, ask Death Star to turn on

Control Brightness
- Alexa, ask Death Star to set glow to 8

Feature Demo
- Alexa, ask Death Star to give full effects

Feedback on performance, bugs and new features will be promptly handled. Leave us a comment in the reviews section!

This skill requires the connected device titled "Alexa-Enabled Death Star Lamp" on Instructables (https://www.instructables.com/id/Alexa-Enabled-Death-Star-Lamp/). Firmware for the Arduino can be found on GitHub (https://github.com/adi3/death_star_lamp). After you invoke the setup command on Alexa, you will be provided with an 8-digit device ID that you will need to add in Line 32 of the firmware.

NB: Once setup is complete, Alexa will process your commands assuming the Arduino is up and running.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
